name: Handmade Sugar Skull Hairclips Candy Colours
description:
Candy colours!
Each detail design is completely original, because I'm not one for repetition. The skull sits on a crocodile clip of approx 6cm in length.

These ones are plain, for those who'd prefer a more understated style.

I'm making everything here to raise money for an Outlook Expeditions trip to Ecuador & the Galapagos Islands. The trip involves a lot of trekking, and helping communities and the local environment, so all sales are going towards this, thanks!

name: Handmade Sugar Skull Hairclips DÃ­a De Los Muertos
description:
Back by popular demand- Charlavail inspired sugar skull hair clips!
Each detail design is completely original, because I'm not one for repetition. The skull sits on a crocodile clip of approx 6cm in length.

Please note the backs of these are a little rough in that the paint isn't as pretty- but hey, who's gonna see that any way? :D

I'm making everything here to raise money for an Outlook Expeditions trip to Ecuador & the Galapagos Islands. The trip involves a lot of trekking, and helping communities and the local environment, so all sales are going towards this, thanks!

name: Lucky Dip Button Bracelets x3
description:
Simple accessories to add to your bracelet collection! In this package you will get a random selection of 3 button tie up bracelets. These would be perfect for the back to school season; understated yet still fun and pretty.

Bracelet lengths vary, but are long enough to tie round the average wrist and cut if necessary.

I'm making everything here to raise money for an Outlook Expeditions trip to Ecuador & the Galapagos Islands. The trip involves a lot of trekking, and helping communities and the local environment, so all sales are going towards this, thanks!
